RHEL6 - MPIO

  1. Install device mapper
    sudo yum install device-mapper-multipath
  2. Create /etc/Multipath.conf
    sudo mpathconf --enable --with_multipathd y
  3. Start multipath daemon
    sudo service multipathd start
  4. List devices
    1. Using fdisk
      sudo fdisk -l | grep mpath
    2. Using multipath
      sudo multipath -ll
